english.segment1: We've tried so hard to understand, but we can't. We held the world out in our hands and you ran away.
english.segment2: It takes some time to let you go and it shows.
english.segment3: Cause all we know is falling, it falls. Remember, cause I know that we won't forget at all.
english.segment4: Now we can follow you back home but we won't. Is this what you had waited for? Just to be alone?
english.segment5: It takes some time to let you go and it shows.
english.segment6: Cause all we know is falling, it falls. Remember, cause I know that we won't forget at all.
english.segment7: You never, you never said. This wasn't what you wanted, was it? Was it?
english.segment8: This isn't what you wanted. This isn't what you wanted.
english.segment9: Cause all we know is falling, it falls. Remember, cause I know that we won't forget at all.
